system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearm Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.X1Qj8vIUDMDE4iQ9]{Autofire Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.rz4pgWSLLDYhl4VH]{Burst Fire Proficiency}

Benefits

When performing autofire attacks, the Recoil Penalty is calculated as CRP-5. When performing sweeping fire attacks, the Recoil Penalty is calculated as CRP-8. When performing any burst fire attacks, the Recoil Penalty is calculated as CRP-1 for two round burst, and CRP-2 for all others. When performing sprayfire attacks, the Recoil Penalty is calculated as CRP-8.

Normal

Sprayfire and sweeping fire have a recoil penalty of CRP-10, autofire has a recoil penalty of CRP-7, and burst fire has a recoil penalty of either CRP-2 or CRP-4
system.summary: Further reduced recoil penalty for Autofire, Sweepfire, Sprayfire, Burstfire
